import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get asset inventory type by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/inventory/types/{assetInventoryTypeId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a single asset inventory type definition by its UUID.

**Prerequisites**
1. **assetInventoryTypeId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/assets/inventory/types](/docs/api/assets/list-asset-inventory-types) to retrieve available types and extract `Items[].AssetInventoryTypeId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List inventory types: [GET /api/v1.0/assets/inventory/types](/docs/api/assets/list-asset-inventory-types).
2. Extract the `AssetInventoryTypeId` for the desired type.
3. Call [GET /api/v1.0/assets/inventory/types/\{assetInventoryTypeId\}](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-inventory-type) for full details.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"assetInventoryTypeId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the asset inventory type to retrieve.","example":"646443ba-8d0b-4dfa-b3c4-16afd540064d","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
